TextView.android:text:
TREASURE WEB application deals with location thus first thing that you will require is internet connectivity. 

Steps to play:
1> REGISTER if your a novice user, Login if you are current user ,Play as guest if you don't want your performance to be stored. 
(HINT: Play as guest will only allow you to play as One Time User) 
2> Select NEWGAME if you want to start all over again or even if your a new user. 
3> Select CONTINUE to continue the game from the last played level. 
4> SCOREBOARD to view the score board. 
5> Click on START button to start the game. 
6> Chose location according to your convinience and SUBMIT. 
7> A CLUE will pop up and You have to Click LETS GO button to continue. 
8> On getting a wrong answer ,you need to exit from the game and play it all again! THANK YOU
